info.title: Examples from Part 3: CSDL
info.description:
This OData service is located at [http://localhost/service-root/](http://localhost/service-root/)

## Entity Data Model
![ER Diagram](http://yuml.me/diagram/class/[Measurement],[Example7to11],[Product{bg:orange}],[Product]-0..1>[Category],[Product]-0..1>[Supplier],[Supplier{bg:orange}],[Customer{bg:orange}],[Order{bg:orange}],[Category{bg:orange}],[Category]-*>[Product],[Employee{bg:orange}],[Employee]-0..1>[Manager],[Employee]^[Manager{bg:orange}],[Manager]-*>[Employee],[Category17{bg:orange}],[Category18{bg:orange}],[Category18]-0..1>[EntityInfo],[EntityInfo],[OrderLine{bg:orange}],[Dimensions],[Product22{bg:orange}],[Product22]-0..1>[Dimensions],[Product22]-0..1>[Dimensions],[ShipmentBox{bg:orange}],[ShipmentBox]-0..1>[Dimensions],[Size],[Size]-0..1>[Length],[Size]-0..1>[Weight],[Product2{bg:orange}],[NullablePrimitiveTypes],[NullablePrimitiveTypes]-0..1>[Color],[NullablePrimitiveTypes]-0..1>[IntegerDecimal],[NonNullablePrimitiveTypes],[NonNullablePrimitiveTypes]-0..1>[Color],[NonNullablePrimitiveTypes]-0..1>[IntegerDecimal],[NonNullablePrimitiveTypes]-0..1>[Text],[Weird{bg:orange}],[Weird]-0..1>[Org.OData.Core.V1.Permission{bg:whitesmoke}],[Weird]-0..1>[Core.Permission{bg:whitesmoke}],[Address],[Address]-0..1>[City],[Address]-0..1>[Region],[Address]-0..1>[Country],[City{bg:orange}],[Region{bg:orange}],[Country{bg:orange}],[Planet{bg:orange}],[NavigationOnly],[NavigationOnly]-0..1>[Planet],[AnnotationOnly],[Order{bg:orange}],[PersonType],[MovieType],[FriendType{bg:orange}],[{bg:whitesmoke}]^[DeveloperType],[ScrumTeamType],[ScrumTeamType]-0..1>[DeveloperType],[{bg:whitesmoke}]^[ArchivedMovieType],[SomeThingType],[SomeThingType]-*>[X.PersonType{bg:whitesmoke}],[SomeThingType]-*>[X.FriendType{bg:whitesmoke}],[ChangeTrackingType])

Model1.Size.title: Size
Model1.Size.description:
T-Shirt Size  
Size, expressed with letters familiar from e.g. T-Shirt sizes

ShippingUnit.description: Contains the unit for property Quantity

InlineableStreamProperties.description: Change tracking supports inlining these stream properties

top.name: $top
top.description: Show only the first n items, see [OData Paging - Top](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.0/odata-v4.0-part1-protocol.html#_Toc445374630)

skip.name: $skip
skip.description: Skip the first n items, see [OData Paging - Skip](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.0/odata-v4.0-part1-protocol.html#_Toc445374631)
